Posts.Content: Hey I’m 31 Found out I had bc at 33 weeks pregnant on 9th August, it’s positive for all hormones and is invasive ductile ,  fast forward to now and I have had my third son and a mastectomy . I’m awaiting my node results Today’s problem is ... even before I was pregnant I noticed a shooting pain in arm and though oh that’s weird . Now the pain in my right arm is stressing me out as that was wide bc was on. I’m so so scared the cancer has spread to my bones and that is what the pain is  I’ve never felt fear like this  Any advice and help would be so grateful right now
Posts.Title: Lost!!!!!
